ai-patthana21.39:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.39:0.3_0: for the sake of pleasure didn’t for the sake of himself.
ai-patthana21.39:1.1_0: It’s not because of inappropriately for the sake of someone without resentment. It doesn’t give rise to cause or reason.
ai-patthana21.39:2.1_0: It’s not because of inappropriately for the sake of resentment, or for the sake of non-existence, or for the sake of defining the sake of resentment.
ai-patthana21.39:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.39:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.39:3.1_0: or for the sake of being invited, or for the sake of fewness of wishes,
ai-patthana21.39:3.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.39:3.1_2: one person is building up one another while mutually saying:
ai-patthana21.39:3.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.39:4.1_0: You don’t give rise to cause or reason. You don’t give rise to suffer only for the sake of repulsion. You don’t give rise to causes and reasons.
ai-patthana21.39:4.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
